Name: Theater Production
Description: A theater production is a production of a play or musical. If the play type represents the written form of the play, the theater production type represents a staging of the play. Properties include the cast, director, designers, crew, and producing company.

Properties.Name: Date Closed
Properties.Description: The last date this production was performed.

Properties.Name: Date Opened
Properties.Description: The date this production first opened (not including previews)

Properties.Name: Number of performances
Properties.Description: The total number of performances for the run of this production.

Properties.Name: Play
Properties.Description: The play that this is a production of.

Properties.Name: Producing Company
Properties.Description: The company that produced this performance.

Properties.Name: Translation Used
Properties.Description: For productions of plays performed in a language other than the one the play was written in, the translation used can be entered here.
